content: Has anyone thought approaching the Pressflow people re suggesting Backdrop as an alternative? ...do we know who's behind it?

...there seem to be 6 people in https://github.com/pressflow and they are from Texas and California.

Pressflow
Pressflow has 4 repositories available. Follow their code on GitHub.
One of them is the founder of Pantheon
@klonos where do you see the compatibility? Pressflow is focused on scaling Drupal: "Pressflow is a fork of Drupal core with enhancements for performance, scalability, and infrastructure. "
It also says most of the patches have been merged into Drupal 7

@Herb I didn't say there was compatibility. I never checked Pressflow before actually, so don't have a clue. Someone from the Greek Drupal community said that it could be an alternative for those that do not want to move to D8/9.
...I guess that if that opinion/rumour exists in the Drupal community in general, then it'd be best to be clarified.

There is a Drupal 7 version of presssflow too -- it is now the pantheon upstream. David Strauss (creator of pressflow, founder of Pantheon) was in our issue queue early in Backdrop's lifestyle, we asked him to help us find a way to remove dbtng :)
